research_title: A Novel Hybrid LSTM-Regional Embedding Architecture for Earthquake Forecasting
key_achievements: Successfully built and trained novel hybrid architecture
Achieved 89.0% prediction accuracy for M≥5.0 earthquakes
Maintained 93.9% F1-score with class imbalance handling
Complete end-to-end research pipeline from raw data to trained model
technical_innovations: Memory-optimized training for large seismic datasets
next_research_directions: Scale to full dataset with distributed training
